Scene:
The House of Yukie Wada
(Wada Yukie yashiki / 和田行家屋敷)

Play: The Vendetta in Iga (伊賀越道中双六)

Production: April 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Hanabusadayū III (豊竹英大夫 (三))

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Seiji (鶴澤清治)

Tsuruzawa Kanotarō (鶴澤叶太郎)
